GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.15.78
GSD.description:
netfilter: ipset: enforce documented limit to prevent allocating huge memory

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.78 by commit 42d20d5e24575c9afa2d66d9a51e7386db9514f5, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit ccf0a4b7fc688561428290265e4effde41446668. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: netfilter: ipset: enforce documented limit to prevent allocating huge memory
